name: Hubspot to PubSub
description: Streaming pipeline. Ingests objects from HubSpot to a PubSub

parameters.name: objectType
parameters.label: Hubspot objects to pull supported by CDAP

parameters.name: pullFrequencySec
parameters.label: delay in seconds between polling for new records updates.

parameters.name: startOffset
parameters.label: inclusive start offset from which the reading should be started.

parameters.name: outputTopic
parameters.label: Pub/Sub output topic
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub topic to write the output, in the format of 'projects/yourproject/topics/yourtopic'
